xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/278478-Chasing Darkness 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dZg2XQUBB2wgoYcmsCga2G92Hhu.jpg When a hit on the leader of a rival gang goes wrong, mob assassin Vinnie Carpone (Todd Humes) decides to renounce his life of crime -- only to discover that the target of his botched assignment is a vampire now out for revenge. As if that weren't enough, Carpone's girlfriend Ciarra (Katie Russell) joins forces with the bloodsucking creatures, and his former boss puts a price on his head. Jason Hull directs this horror-thriller. Chasing Darkness
